fields.name: Airport Lounge Pass
fields.description: Relax in our airport lounge before boarding, and escape the crowded, noisy departure terminal. Help yourself to refreshments and drinks, kick-back in comfortable seating, log on to Wi-Fi and enjoy the wait. Make your flight that little more special with our Lounge Pass.

fields.name: Additional Baggage
fields.description: We throw in a minimum of 20kg baggage for everyone on all our holidays, but if you need even more space, you can add an extra bag per person. A maximum of 2 bags is allowed per passenger.

fields.name: Reserved Seating
fields.description: Whether you want to take in the view with a window seat, prefer the aisle, or want some space to stretch out with extra legroom, you can pick exactly where you sit before you set off.

fields.name: In-flight Meals
fields.description: Dine on a delicious meal when you fly with us, with a starter, main, dessert and drink served directly to your seat by our friendly cabin crew.  Available on all short-haul flights less than 2 hours 30 minutes.
